AI vs. Non-AI Job Growth: Displacement or Innovation?

Author

Vidhi A. Sharma, Soham Deshkhaire, Nhan (Johnny) Huynh

Published

February 12, 2025

1 AI vs. Non-AI Job Growth: Displacement or Innovation?

Artificial Intelligence is reshaping the global workforce. From automation replacing clerical jobs to AI creating entirely new industries, the job market is undergoing a rapid transformation.

  • Who wins and who loses?
  • Which industries are AI-powered and which ones remain untouched?
  • How should job seekers adapt to this shift?

This report analyzes real-world job market data to separate hype from reality.

ğŸ” Key Insights:
âœ” AI-driven job loss vs. job creation
âœ” Salary trends: AI-powered careers vs. traditional roles
âœ” Emerging job titles due to AI advancements
âœ” Strategies for future-proofing careers

â€œThe robots are coming for your jobs!â€
But are they really? Letâ€™s analyze the data.

3 Future-Proofing Your Career in the AI Era
